patthana23.43:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.43:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana23.43:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
